review: I really like that you can get a hamburger without a bun. The burger was good, if slightly more rare than I would have liked. The fries too were underdone (I prefer them crispy). But the person there was very nice and spoke English, which I appreciated.
name: Meredith Bond

review: I wish I had found this place sooner! Ordered the # 5 combo, and got a nice sized juicy messy burger that was cooked perfect. It had just enough pink in the center, like a burger should. Fries were cooked perfect also. All for 129 rph. ‚Ä¶
name: Denis Dragomirik

review: Really cheap prices! I've liked these burgers ‚Äî they have no extra spices, I feel good after them (which is not truth about burgers from McDonalds). This is not fast-food, but you make order near the door. This is not minus ‚Äî just ‚Ä¶

review:
Nice and not expensive burgers, fries, waffles and homemade drinks.
Salads and breakfasts are also very good.
Cozy space and nice inerior design.
name: Chuck Bass

review: Good and cozy place to seat and eat delicious burgers or snacks. Definitely recommend to visit!
name: H K

review: I ordered Der Blue burger with cherry, but the smell was so strange, even the taste was bitter. So I came to the waiter and told my issue. He kindly offered me the other one. Therefore they distributed me another burger for free. New one I liked more
name: Yegor K

review: Really great chicken nuggets and fries. Good burgers. Friendly staff who speak English very well. This place is a regular for us.
name: Dmytro Murashko

review: Good service and pretty cheap burger compared to other burger places. However the burger was disappointing. Beef burger has some stuff hard to chew, which seems that the meat is grounded with other parts. Chicken in the burger was also not tasty. Quality of meat isn‚Äôt high compared to other places. Mushroom soup was ok.

name: Yuriy Sheyko

review: Probably the worst combination of price and quality. Ordered two beef burgers, fries and sauce as take away: one of the burgers appeared to be with chicken and no sauce was discovered. 2 stars cause beer is pretty fine.
